original_text: When he gave to the sea his decree, that the waters should not pass his commandment: when he appointed the foundations of the earth:
korean_text: 바다의 한계를 정하여 물이 명령을 거스르지 못하게 하시며 또 땅의 기초를 정하실 때에

sentences.original_text: When he gave to the sea his decree
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바다에게 그의 명령을 주셨을 때

sentences.original_text: that the waters should not pass his commandment
when he appointed the foundations of the earth
